TextView.android:text: HelpApp is the application, which ensures and reinforces the correlation between people, who wants to help and who is needed, in order to create, maintain and evolute the culture of volunteering, volunteer initiative and volunteer activity of citizens, institutes of civil society, business sector and state agencies. The app not only informs, but also taking concrete action. Advanced functionality provides users with the ability to provide assistance of any kind. Thus, absolutely anyone has a chance to make their own, albeit enlarge contribution for improving the world. Simple and sleek design makes the application intuitive and accessible for everyone. Due to the application of the ordered structure, the user can clearly determine what kind of help he wants to get or give. HelpApp - an innovative application that will change the world.
